languages.text: {n}Ваша копия понимающе улыбается.{/n} "Я — Великолепн{mf|ый|ая} {name} фон Валанциус. И если я хорошо себя знаю — а я отлично себя знаю, — сейчас ты гадаешь, что же такое тогда ты. Это просто, ты — моя версия из менее славной реальности, плод дурного влияния сокровища, за которым я иду".

{n}Your replica smiles in understanding.{/n} "I am {name} von Valancius the Magnificent. And if I know myself, which I most certainly do, you are now pondering what that makes you. The answer is simple. You are my reflection from a less glorious reality, a product of the malign influence of the treasure that I seek."
languages.original_text: {n}Ваша копия понимающе улыбается.{/n} "Я — Великолепн{mf|ый|ая} {name} фон Валанциус. И если я хорошо себя знаю — а я отлично себя знаю, — сейчас ты гадаешь, что же такое тогда ты. Это просто, ты — моя версия из менее славной реальности, плод дурного влияния сокровища, за которым я иду".

The answer is simple. You are my reflection from a less glorious reality, a product of the malign influence of the treasure that I am after."
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: {n}Votre réplique répond avec un sourire bienveillant :{/n} « Je suis {name} von Valancius {mf|le|la} Magnifique. Me connaissant, je sais que vous vous demandez maintenant ce que cela fait de vous. La réponse est simple : vous êtes mon reflet dans une réalité moins glorieuse, un produit de l'influence néfaste du trésor que je recherche. »
languages.original_text: {n}Your replica smiles in understanding.{/n} "I am {name} von Valancius the Magnificent. And if I know myself, which I most certainly do, you are now pondering what that makes you. The answer is simple. You are my reflection from a less glorious reality, a product of the malign influence of the treasure that I seek."

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre réplique répond avec un sourire bienveillant :{/n} « Je suis {name} von Valancius {mf|le|la} Magnifique. Me connaissant, je sais que vous vous demandez maintenant ce que cela fait de vous. La réponse est simple : vous êtes mon reflet dans une réalité moins glorieuse, un produit de l'influence néfaste du trésor que je recherche. »
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: {n}Tu réplica te lanza una sonrisa de comprensión..{/n} «Soy {name} von Valancius {mf|el|la} Magnífic{mf|o|a}. Si me conozco, y sí, es el caso, te estás preguntando qué eres tú. La respuesta es sencilla. Eres mi reflejo de una realidad menos gloriosa, un producto del influjo maligno del tesoro que busco».
languages.original_text: {n}Your replica smiles in understanding.{/n} "I am {name} von Valancius the Magnificent. And if I know myself, which I most certainly do, you are now pondering what that makes you. The answer is simple. You are my reflection from a less glorious reality, a product of the malign influence of the treasure that I seek."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu réplica te lanza una sonrisa de comprensión..{/n} «Soy {name} von Valancius {mf|el|la} Magnífic{mf|o|a}. Si me conozco, y sí, es el caso, te estás preguntando qué eres tú. La respuesta es sencilla. Eres mi reflejo de una realidad menos gloriosa, un producto del influjo maligno del tesoro que busco».
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: {n}你的复制人会心一笑。{/n}“我是伟人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。我很了解我自己，我也能想象出来，你此刻正在思考你自己究竟是什么。答案很简单，你是我不那么光彩的一面反射出来的倒影，是我追求的那些宝藏的邪恶诅咒招致的产物。”
languages.original_text: {n}Your replica smiles in understanding.{/n} "I am {name} von Valancius the Magnificent. And if I know myself, which I most certainly do, you are now pondering what that makes you. The answer is simple. You are my reflection from a less glorious reality, a product of the malign influence of the treasure that I seek."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的复制人会心一笑。{/n}“我是伟人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。我很了解我自己，我也能想象出来，你此刻正在思考你自己究竟是什么。答案很简单，你是我不那么光彩的一面反射出来的倒影，是我追求的那些宝藏的邪恶诅咒招致的产物。”
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: {n}あなたのレプリカは理解したとでも言うように微笑んだ。{/n}「私は偉大なる{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスだ。そして私が私自身のことを理解していれば、間違いなくこう思うだろう。何がお前を作り出しているのか、と。答えは簡単だ。お前は、私が追い求めている宝物の悪意ある影響から生まれた、栄光なき現実の、私の鏡像なのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Your replica smiles in understanding.{/n} "I am {name} von Valancius the Magnificent. And if I know myself, which I most certainly do, you are now pondering what that makes you. The answer is simple. You are my reflection from a less glorious reality, a product of the malign influence of the treasure that I seek."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたのレプリカは理解したとでも言うように微笑んだ。{/n}「私は偉大なる{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスだ。そして私が私自身のことを理解していれば、間違いなくこう思うだろう。何がお前を作り出しているのか、と。答えは簡単だ。お前は、私が追い求めている宝物の悪意ある影響から生まれた、栄光なき現実の、私の鏡像なのだ」
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: {n}Deine Kopie lächelt verständnisvoll.{/n} "Ich bin {name} von Valancius {mf|der|die} Erhabene. Und wenn ich mich selbst gut kenne, was ich ganz gewiss tue, überlegt Ihr nun gerade, zu was das Euch macht. Die Antwort ist simpel. Ihr seid meine Reflexion aus einer weniger glorreichen Realität, ein Produkt des bösen Einflusses des Schatzes, den ich suche."
languages.original_text: {n}Your replica smiles in understanding.{/n} "I am {name} von Valancius the Magnificent. And if I know myself, which I most certainly do, you are now pondering what that makes you. The answer is simple. You are my reflection from a less glorious reality, a product of the malign influence of the treasure that I seek."

Ihr seid meine Reflexion aus einer weniger glorreichen Realität, ein Produkt des bösen Einflusses des Schatzes, den ich suche."
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: {n}Kopyan, anlayışlı bir biçimde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Ben Muazzam {name} von Valancius. Kendimi tanıyorsam şimdi kim olduğunu merak ediyorsundur. Cevap çok basit. Benim daha az şanlı bir gerçeklikten gelen yansımamsın, aradığım hazinenin kötü etkisinin bir ürünüsün."
languages.original_text: {n}Your replica smiles in understanding.{/n} "I am {name} von Valancius the Magnificent. And if I know myself, which I most certainly do, you are now pondering what that makes you. The answer is simple. You are my reflection from a less glorious reality, a product of the malign influence of the treasure that I seek."
